Name: Robot Revolt
About the game: THE ROBOTS HAVE REBELLED! Shoot, survive and defend as an armored vehicle against a rebellious swarm of robots. Pick up what was once known as floppy disks to gather knowledge and experience. WEAPONS WITH SPECIALIZATIONS Choose from a vast collection of upgrades and weapons, each with their own branching specializations and perks. Unlock a selection of vehicles and traits for unique and diverse gameplay experience. DUNGEON AND MAP CHALLENGES Discover and explore factories and buildings for extra loot, but be ware of the increasing danger and challenges lying behind those entries. Features 3 different vehicles with diverse behavior. More than 21 unique weapons and upgrades. Obtain bonus effects by mixing and matching traits. Fast paced, short and casual bullet hell shooter.
